arts.ttl: Irish in action: Callum Robinson strengthens Ireland case as James Abankwah plays big part in Watford win
arts.sum: Abankwah signed for Watford on loan from Udinese during the week, a popular direction of traffic between the clubs, and the former St Patrick's Athletic defender played for 75 minutes, winning positive reviews for responding in a controlled fashion to picking up a booking inside the first minute. There are some at Rovers who retain a hope that Kenny could return on a short-term loan move because of a rule which means he cannot play official games for three different clubs between July 1 of last year and June 30 of this year.

arts.ttl: Cardiff manager sent off after furious confrontation with Swansea player in derby win
arts.sum: Cardiff City manager Omer Riza was sent off in the closing stages of his side's 3-0 win over Swansea City after becoming enraged at Goncalo Franco for barging into him

arts.ttl: Cardiff thump Swansea in ill-tempered derby | Cardiff 3-0 Swansea
arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Cardiff and Swansea

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Cardiff sink Swansea as Hull grasp vital victory
arts.sum: Callum Robinson hits double in fiery 3-0 derby triumph QPR deepen Plymouth woes with Kolli grabbing only goal Cardiff claimed their biggest South Wales derby win for nearly 60 years with a 3-0 Championship victory at home to Swansea. Callum Robinson’s brace at the start of the second half put Cardiff in command and Dimitrios Goutas thundered home a header off the underside of the crossbar to ram home their superiority. It ended a run of six games without home joy for Cardiff and secured the biggest league victory over their arch-rivals since winning 5-0 at Ninian Park in April 1965. This roundup will update later after the 3pm kick-offs Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Robinson double steers Cardiff to victory in South Wales derby
arts.sum: Cardiff claimed their biggest South Wales derby league win for nearly 60 years with a 3-0 Sky Bet Championship home victory over Swansea.

arts.ttl: Impressive Cardiff show improvement to see off Swansea in fiery derby
arts.sum: The relegation-threatened Bluebirds had failed to win any of their previous six home matches.

arts.ttl: Here’s how the Connacht players rated in their win over Cardiff
arts.sum: Set up bonus point try with a sublime break for replacement scrum-half Matthew Devine to crown a solid display as he heads into Six Nations camp with the kid brother. All of his Irish teammates outside Connacht will be coming in off Champions Cup action but Aki has made the most of the second tier competition over the past two weekends and created the opening three tries in this one on a night when he made 24 carries.
